mapper.insert: INSERT into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES (#{rno}, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, reply_date, update_date FROM tbl_reply where rno = #{rno}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, update_date = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
